H0.text: The musical ‘Half a Sixpence’ was based on which 1905 novel. The Old Wives' Tale

H1.text: The musical ‘Half a Sixpence’ was based on which 1905 novel. The House of Mirth

H2.text: The musical ‘Half a Sixpence’ was based on which 1905 novel. The Jungle

H3.text: The musical ‘Half a Sixpence’ was based on which 1905 novel. KIPPS

A4.text: The Old Wives' Tale is a novel by Arnold Bennett, first published in January 1908.

A5.text: Kipps (1905) is a novel of social realism describing lower-middle-class English life.
